Job Title: Marketing Operations Manager, Brand Audience Expansion

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Marketing, Sales

Description:
About Shopify

Shopify is innovating faster than any other commerce stack. We put independence within reach for anyone with a dream to start a business. We transform enteprises and work with some of the world's biggest names and brands who are pushing the limits — and expect us to, too.

While millions of merchants in over 175 countries already use Shopify, the remaining opportunity is vat. This is life-defining work that directly impacts people’s lives as much as it transforms your own. This is putting the power of the few in the hands of the many, is a future with more voices rather than fewer, and is creating more choices instead of an elite option.

About The Role

We are in search of a Marketing Operations Manager to join the Brand & Audience Expansion team and support the operational execution of critical missions.

As Marketing Operations Manager, you will manage and collaborate with cross-functional peers on the Brand and Audience Expansion team to plan, produce, coordinate, and track the results of brand and marketing campaigns on a mission to inspire and empower more entrepreneurs. You will also be responsible for creating the tools and processes that help our leadership make decisions and better understand how our team is tracking against our goals.

You would be an ideal candidate if you are hands-on and thrive in a fast-paced, ever-changing environment. You are highly organized and thrive on designing thoughtful processes and systems to help teams thrive. You are a self-starter that enjoys navigating ambiguity through experimentation and iteration and who knows how to solve problems that are not well defined.

You’ll get to do things like:

Ensure teams have a strong operating systems and rituals to enable information flow, improved decision making/ execution, alignment, accountability and feedbackOwn key tasks and process that keep our critical brand programs organized and on-track, always aiming to find the right tool for the jobDevelop a deep understanding of how teams work and what’s in their way, to solve bottlenecks, streamline communication, and help us focus and move fasterExecuting internal/special operational projects, to improve the team experience, drive operational improvements, and best practices across the teamCollaborate with key stakeholders to improve efficiency, effectiveness and escalate areas of opportunities/risks


Qualifications

Curious and resourceful - creative problem-solving skills and a “get stuff done” attitudeExperience with business operations, marketing operations, go-to-market or project managementAbility to be proactive and relentless: capable of seeking information independently, solving conceptual problems, and corralling resources and delivering resultsGreat cross-functional team player, always ready to roll up your sleeves and work in the detailsStrong communication skills, including presentations, and facilitationStrong analytical skills; Proficient with Excel/GoogleSheetsComfortable in a fast-paced, ambiguous environment


Bonus points if you have the following

Retail or Partnership management experience, including vendor and contracts managementStrong understanding of supporting teams through procurements and creative processes including experience planning, managing, and executing projects related to marketing campaigns (digital, experiential, external partners etc)The ability to embrace uncertainty and run with risks


We know that looking for a new role can be both exciting and time-consuming, and we truly appreciate your effort. We're looking forward to learning more about you and your interest in joining the team.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
